titles.title: A bill for the relief of Malachy McAllister, Nicola McAllister, and Sean Ryan McAllister.
A bill for the relief of Malachy McAllister, Nicola McAllister, and Sean Ryan McAllister.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Provides for the relief of Malachy McAllister, Nicola McAllister, and Sean Ryan McAllister.
